short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows Web Page load statistics on top left corner of the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows Web Page load statistics on top left corner of the page.

You still can see your web page's LCP and other metrics with the dev tools but this extension makes it easier to have a look at core performance metrics.

Using `window.performance.timing.domContentLoadedEventEnd` it shows a little badge text to see the time it took for the web page to fully load at a glance. Click on the extension to see more performance metrics.

Have suggestions? send an email!
